## T Test


```{r ttest}
set.seed(2820)
preTreat <- c(rnorm(1000, mean = 145, sd = 9))
postTreat <- c(rnorm(1000, mean = 138, sd = 8))
t.test(preTreat, postTreat, paired = TRUE)
```

```{r gshit}
ggbetweenstats(
     x = preTreat,
     y = postTreat,
     title = "Distribution of sepal length across Iris species")
```
